title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1998/98 of 18 September 1998 on tenders submitted under the third invitation to tender for beef put up for sale in Regulation (EC) No 1324/98
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1998/98 of 18 September 1998 on tenders submitted under the third invitation to tender for beef put up for sale in Regulation (EC) No 1324/98
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: No action shall be taken on the basis of the tenders submitted under the invitation to tender referred to in Article 2(1)(c) of Regulation (EC) No 1324/98.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 19 September 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 September 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 24.
(2) OJ L 210, 28. 7. 1998, p. 17.
(3) OJ L 183, 26. 6. 1998, p. 38.
(4) OJ L 251, 5. 10. 1979, p. 12.
(5) OJ L 248, 14. 10. 1995, p. 39.
